players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Charlie is the mafia. He was quiet and had no alibi. Diana seems suspicious too."
Charlie: "I think the mafia is either Alice or Diana; I'm just a villager."
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found she's the mafia."
Diana: "I was the detective, I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob was killed by her. Vote Alice, she knows I'm detective and will try to frame me."
You: "Diana, why didn't you investigate Charlie? If you were the detective you'd check him. Charlie, your claim is weak. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and found she is mafia."

players.name: Bob

Alice was arrested
